name: Game Night (titanforged)
description:
For All Ages

Game Night is an online multiplayer tabletop game containing several game types. The games included are Poker, Ludo, Draw It!, Chess and more. It is intended for all age groups and is very family friendly. Whether you're young or old, you will have a lot of fun playing this game!

Endless Multiplayer Games

Game Night is constantly getting updated with new tabletop games! The games can be played by 2 players and up to 10 players in a single game. All the tabletop games can be played in multiplayer. Invite your friends and have fun playing with them!

Ranks & Coins

For the players who love to compete, Game Night has a ranking system for each game! Play your favorite games and earn points for each game played. The better your in-game performance is, the more points you'll get. Playing games will reward you with coins. Use your coins in our awesome in-game shop!

Find New Friends

You can start a conversation with players while relaxing in the lobby menu or in-game! Use the chat to communicate with others and add them to your friend list if you wish to. Playing with others is always more fun!
